headline: COGNEX PC BASED MACHINE VISION SYSTEM
description: PC Based Machine Vision System     Cognex Checkpoint 900C is the ideal choice for applications requiring color image processing. The systems high-accuracy color vision tools are able to reliably recognize subtle differences in parts that would go unrecognized by grey-scale vision systems. Typical applications include sorting pharmaceutical tablets by color and color verification of LEDs and keys on mobile phones.
categories.lvl2: Inspection Equipment  >  Optical Inspection Equipment > Other Optical Inspection
